column2: "Yeah, well, as far as I'm concerned, that kind of scum is the lowest of the low. Honestly, isn't that a stereotype?"
"I'll just hand this over to you instead of pointlessly trying to show off my lack of skills. You'll do me proud, right?"
"I know you're the best choice for the job. There's no opponent you can't handle. Plus, you'll do it quick as a flash. "
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
